title: Highest Quality of Regulations for Financial Services
description: In 2024, Hungary achieved a score of 99.44 in the quality of regulations for financial services, indicating a highly robust regulatory environment.

title: Fastest Growth in Agriculture, Forestry, and Fishing
description: In 2023, Hungary's agriculture, forestry, and fishing sectors experienced a remarkable growth rate of 68.67%, showcasing significant expansion.

title: Universal Access to Safe Drinking Water in Rural Areas
description: By 2022, 100% of Hungary's rural population had access to safely managed drinking water services, ensuring clean water for all.

title: Lowest Foreign Direct Investment Outflows
description: In 2023, Hungary had a foreign direct investment net outflow of -34.80% of GDP, indicating a significant withdrawal of investments.
